attributes.action: Ryan Air - 1 PILOT PER FLIGHT FOR £10 LESS, IS YOUR LIFE WORT IT?
attributes.additional_details:
Ryanair Chief Michael O'Leary wants to reduce his flight staff to one pilot per flight saying it will potentially reduce flight costs by £10 per person, advertising this in September 2012, his tag line being " Trains don’t need 2 drivers, why do planes?"

O’Leary, when a train has to STOP due to an absence of driver the train STOPS (it’s called a dead man’s switch), when a plane STOPS without a pilot it DROPS !!!!!

 £10 is not an amount I would equate with significantly reducing my life expectancy whenever I step on a Ryanair flight.

Please sign up to this petition to stop O'Leary from further endangering our lives and those around us and strive to ensure our safety in the air is not ridiculed by an unnecessary cost cutting exercise.
